Record.ClassificationPath: Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Connective Tissue Diseases/Cartilage Diseases/Tietze's Syndrome
Record.Description: Idiopathic painful nonsuppurative swellings of one or more costal cartilages, especially of the second rib. The anterior chest pain may mimic that of coronary artery disease. (Dorland, 27th ed.)
